programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Demon Deacons enjoy home state advantage when they face the Bulldogs in the Duke's Mayo Bowl. Wake Forest is 11-6 all-time in bowl games, but lost in this contest in 2020. Mississippi State is 15-11 in the postseason, and won this event in 2015.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU squad tries to keep Detective Rollins' sister safe from her abusive boyfriend when she turns up beaten and pregnant; when Rollins is forced to take drastic action, an internal affairs investigation begins.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson struggles to balance work and her new role of foster mother; when Amaro arrests a young prostitute with connections to Noah's mother, his undercover work sets off a dangerous chain of events.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a series of allegations are made against a superstar basketball player, Sgt. Benson and Detective Carisi (Peter Scanavino) do not agree on the authenticity of each woman's story; the investigation takes Rollins back to her former precinct.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When detective Tutuola finds security footage of a sportscaster being physically abusive to his girlfriend, Benson seeks help from Assistant DA Barba to convince the victim to fight back.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The media spotlight shines on Sgt. Benson when she investigates a string of rapes that have similarities with crimes in Atlanta; a family court judge threatens to remove baby Noah from Benson's care.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a sergeant's son is accused of rape, Benson is put in a difficult position and forced to make a choice between loyalty and duty.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson walks into a hostage situation at a neighborhood restaurant; Rollins tries to help her father after he's hospitalized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson investigates allegations against a popular radio personality; Rollins goes under cover when a shocking confession leads to another crime.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The only witness to the beating of a woman (Judy Kuhn) is her daughter (Paulina Gerzon) who has Williams syndrome.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An abused foster child (Jae Head), apprehended while driving a runaway van, leads the detectives to re-examine a case involving a rape victim (Sara Gilbert).

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman is found in Riverside Park, beaten and raped with no memory of what happened; during the investigation, Olivia must face the fact that she still thinks like a victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A DNA dragnet catches a killer eight years after the kidnapping, rape and murder of a college coed in Oklahoma.
Emergency response providers put their lives at risk to save others.
A night at an amusement park takes a deadly turn when a roller coaster malfunction leaves lives hanging in the balance; Abby reaches out to Buck; Athena and Hen respond to an unusual home invasion.

Bobby and his team respond to an emergency at a children's birthday party; the crew jumps into action after one of their own is involved in a devastating accident; Athena tries to cope with a tragedy that hits way too close to home.

Bobby and the team race to help the survivors of a deadly plane crash; Athena deals with chaos at the airport; Bobby confronts his past demons; Athena is out for revenge against teen bullies; Abby delivers an important message from a 9-1-1 caller.

The crew races to an emergency at an Indian wedding; Abby enlists Buck to help her find her mother; Abby meets Athena for the first time; Bobby confronts his past; Hen struggles to make the right decision.

On Valentine's Day, a surprise marriage proposal goes awry with dangerous consequences; Athena attempts to help a desperate woman; Bobby and Chimney pull holiday duty; Abby and Buck go on their first official date.

A full moon keeps the crew busy with crazy calls; Athena investigates a potential home invasion; Abby helps investigate a caller's murder; Bobby and Buck have their hands full at a yoga studio for pregnant women; Hen's past may become her future.
Bobby gets a surprising phone call from his doctor after donating at Chimney's blood drive; Athena confronts Michael after having a heart-to-heart with their kids.

The first responders race to help a homeless man crushed in a garbage truck, a mother and son in a crashed elevator, and extreme hoarders trapped in their house; Athena starts dating; the situation with Abby's mother tests her relationship with Buck.

The first responders take calls involving an unusual domestic disturbance, a "death" at a psychic's place, and a motorcycle crash; Bobby dips his toes into the dating pool; Abby walks down memory lane, and Buck is confronted by his past actions.

The first responders race to rescue victims trapped in various tight spots; Athena contemplates accepting a promotion that will take her out of the field; Chimney finally deals with the aftermath of his near fatal car crash.

Maddie goes on a ride-along with Athena; Hen must figure out how to save her family from permanently falling apart; the first responders deal with emergencies both at a military funeral and a movie theater.

programme.desc: A woman continues searching for answers after the investigation into her daughter's murder goes cold.
